titleStmt.title: [A short treatise of the sacraments generally, and in speciall of baptisme, and of the Supper] [written by Iohn Prime ...]
titleStmt.author: Prime, John, 1550-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. lacking; beginning-signature A₄ of defective Sion College Library copy spliced at end; tightly bound and cropped.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
